item.title: Robolucha mask editor
item.description: Today Robolucha was updated including the mask editor, where you can customize your luchador mask, and see it in the arena! You can change colors and forms for several different layers, give a try and show your creativity with new cool masks for your luchador. Try the new mask editor here: http://ring.robolucha.com If you don´t know robolucha, it is a fantastic game I created where you can code your “luchadores” using javascript and battle in an arena with your friends.
